fields.name: AgcAndColorStripeRestriction
fields.description: Configures Automatic Gain Control (AGC) and Color Stripe in the license. Must be between 0 and 3 inclusive.

fields.name: AllowPassingVideoContentToUnknownOutput
fields.description: Configures Unknown output handling settings of the license.

fields.name: AnalogVideoOpl
fields.description: Specifies the output protection level for compressed digital audio.

fields.name: CompressedDigitalAudioOpl
fields.description: Specifies the output protection level for compressed digital audio.

fields.name: CompressedDigitalVideoOpl
fields.description: Specifies the output protection level for compressed digital video.

fields.name: DigitalVideoOnlyContentRestriction
fields.description: Enables the Image Constraint For Analog Component Video Restriction in the license.

fields.name: ExplicitAnalogTelevisionOutputRestriction
fields.description: Configures the Explicit Analog Television Output Restriction in the license. Configuration data must be between 0 and 3 inclusive.

fields.name: FirstPlayExpiration
fields.description: The amount of time that the license is valid after the license is first used to play content.

fields.name: ImageConstraintForAnalogComponentVideoRestriction
fields.description: Enables the Image Constraint For Analog Component Video Restriction in the license.

fields.name: ImageConstraintForAnalogComputerMonitorRestriction
fields.description: Enables the Image Constraint For Analog Component Video Restriction in the license.

fields.name: ScmsRestriction
fields.description: Configures the Serial Copy Management System (SCMS) in the license. Must be between 0 and 3 inclusive.

fields.name: UncompressedDigitalAudioOpl
fields.description: Specifies the output protection level for uncompressed digital audio.

fields.name: UncompressedDigitalVideoOpl
fields.description: Specifies the output protection level for uncompressed digital video.
